img_summary: The image depicts a bowl containing three spherical, textured seeds, likely representing a specific type of seed item from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding metadata and context, it is part of a catalog of collectible seeds, which players can obtain randomly by gathering specific plants or fruits. The image serves to visually represent one of these in-game seed items, contributing to the game's immersive inventory or crafting system.
